questions.quote: It's morning. Thanks for seeing me through the night. I'll make us a pot of coffee, George. Watch her, won't you?
With Jon Voight's teeth marks.  Owner's manual...you know what? This car was owned by Jon Voight.
Tell that to Bobby Colby. All that kid wanted to do was go home. Well he went home alright, with a crater in his colon the size of a cutlet. Had to sit him on a cork the eighteen-hour flight home!
But I did. My boyfriend said I got gonorrhea from riding the tractor in my bathing suit.
Wait a minute. I thought that Art wanted to give up the exporting.
I am lying down. I am trapped under a funky mattress. I gotta go get a doctor or at least come over and roll this thing off of me.
Alright, alright, but no funny business, same deal as last night.
Atlantic City?  Yes! Yes! I will go to Atlantic City. I'm in. I'm down.
Forget the shower! The shower's out. Move it! Put your clothes on! Put your clothes on!  Where are you going?
Well, a bunch of people are getting together tomorrow night at some bar for her birthday, but...  you don't want to go to... that... no.
